message.content: Yes, the authors describe the limitations of their work. In the Appendix D section, they mention that the main limitation of their empirical investigation is the selection of the MDP families, near-optimal agents, and scenarios. They state that while they believe they have proposed a solid methodology, they are open to discussing the inclusion of additional experiments to further enhance Colosseum.

Yes, the authors describe the limitations of their work. They specifically mention the main limitation of their empirical investigation as the selection of the MDP families, near-optimal agents, and scenarios. They state that although they believe they have proposed a solid methodology, they are open to discussing the inclusion of additional experiments to further enhance Colosseum.

Yes, the authors describe the limitations of their work. They mention the main limitation of their empirical investigation is the selection of the MDP families, near-optimal agents, and scenarios. They acknowledge that, while they have proposed a solid methodology, they are open to discussing the inclusion of additional experiments to further enhance Colosseum.
